title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Diesel and Ibn Khaldūn
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Diesel and Ibn Khaldūn
description:
Holly and Tracy talk about the gossipy nature of press coverage about men like Rudolph Diesel. The gap between Ibn Khaldūn's life and the time when analysis of his work really began is also discussed. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
